R

readLeaderBoardFile(int) - Method in class leaderBoard.LeaderBoardCenterPanel
Reads in the high scorer file and reads in each of the scores only to determine how the scores are arranged from high to low.
reducePlayerHealth(int) - Method in class main.GameModel
Reduces the players health when an enemy makes it out of the Estuary by making it to the end of the path.
reducePlayerMoney(int) - Method in class main.GameModel
Reduces the players money when a Tower is purchased in the game.
remove() - Method in class controller.EnemyIterator
Removes an enemy model from the arrayList of enemies and decrements the arrayList size and index.
removeLabelOnMouse() - Method in class boardMenu.BoardMenuView
Removes the label on the mouse once a tower is placed on the center panel.
removeLabelOnMouse() - Method in class tutorial.TutorialView
Removes the label on the mouse once a tower is placed on the center panel.
removeRangeLabels() - Method in class boardMenu.BoardMenuCenterPanel
Removes a rangeLabel that was created from the layeredPane on the center panel and revalidates the layeredPane after this method is called.
removeRangeLabels() - Method in class tutorial.TutorialCenterPanel
Removes a rangeLabel that was created from the layeredPane on the center panel and revalidates the layeredPane after this method is called.
resetReload(int) - Method in class main.GameModel
Resets the reload time of the tower that is in the tower arrayList.
run() - Method in class controller.GameController
Controls what happens with every game tick of the timer that is running for the game and updates the BoardMenuView accordingly based on events that are taking place.
run() - Method in class controller.TutorialGameController
Is the main controller for the game that is run on the thread through the use of the Runnable interface.
